[![Figma Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Figma-F24E1E?style=for-the-badge&logo=figma&logoColor=white)](https://www.figma.com/@sharun)


Hi there 👋! \
I'm Sharun, B.Tech undergrad at CUSAT. I am a self taught Full Stack Developer, currently working on my own projects. I am passionate about building things that live on the internet, and I love learning about new technologies and how to make them work for the good of the web.

- 🔭 I’m currently working on Personal Webpage. 
- 🌱 I’m currently learning Next.js, Flutter.
- 🤔 I’m looking for help with starting a blog.
- 💬 Ask me about Python or C++
- 📫 How to reach me: [@sharun_rajeev](https://twitter.com/sharun_rajeev)

profile_summary:
Here's a concise, SEO-optimized first-person profile description that highlights Sharun E Rajeev's strongest technical skills and expertise.

I'm Sharun, a self-taught Full Stack Developer with a strong background in building dynamic web applications using TypeScript. As an undergrad at CUSAT, I enjoy working on personal projects that leverage my proficiency in programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, and C++. In my current pursuits, I'm actively learning Next.js and Flutter, and I'm interested in exploring the intersection of technology and the web. I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions that drive positive change.

I engage with the developer community on platforms like Twitter and LinkedIn, and I'm excited to collaborate with like-minded professionals who share my enthusiasm for building and learning.

Note: I excluded extraneous technical skills mentioned in the README section and focused on the skills explicitly mentioned as core technical skills by Sharun. I also added a couple of sentences to showcase Sharun's background, interests, and community engagement. The description aims to be concise while highlighting Sharun's strengths and personality.
